name: Panel: Decentralised Narratives
description: What role will decentralised storytelling play in Autonomous Worlds, and what can these new frameworks learn from existing forms of lore, fandom and participatory culture?

speakers.name: Kara Kittel
speakers.bio: Kara Kittel is a creative producer and researcher based in New York. She is a co-founder of Team Rolfes, an experimental 3D animation studio, and Other Internet Research Institute, an in-the-world lab investigating the psychological, political, and economic effects of digitalization. Her current research interests include collaborative authorship and informal coordination practices in online communities.

speakers.name: GVN
speakers.bio: GVN is co-founder of Moving Castles, a game design studio researching and developing Autonomous Worlds.

speakers.name: Venkatesh Rao
speakers.bio: Venkatesh Rao led the Summer of Protocols research program earlier this year and has been blogging at Ribbonfarm since 2007.
